columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a role assignment uniquely.

columns.name: target_account_id
columns.description: The identifier of the AWS account from which to list the assignments.

columns.name: instance_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SSO Instance under which the operation will be executed.

columns.name: permission_set_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the permission set from which to list assignments.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center.
